programme.desc: Due to similar names, Indah Permatasari ended up transporting the wrong person in her online taxi. The problem was that the person being transported was a successful young entrepreneur like Dimas Anggara, who was rushing to the inauguration of his 11th branch. Will Indah and Dimas give her five stars? Or will they report her to their company and get fired? Or will they just make her their girlfriend?

programme.title: DEWI RINDU - EP 33
programme.desc: Dewi is a girl with big dreams. She is determined to become successful and lift her family out of economic hardship. But who would have thought that her beautiful dream would be shattered and she would have to face the bitter reality of being pregnant out of wedlock.

programme.title: Katanya Kamu Suka Modus, Affah Iya?
programme.desc: Farel's car was confiscated, forcing him to travel by motorcycle. On the road, Farel met Alin, who was in a hurry and suddenly got on her motorcycle, but Farel's motorcycle broke down. Alin and Farel met again on campus after Farel was accused of peeping in the women's restroom. Farel held a grudge against Alin and often bullied her.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 487
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. programme.title: JANGAN KAYA ORANG SUSAH
programme.desc: Juleha (Rebecca Klopper) had to hold back her annoyance when she was driving a motorbike taxi because her passenger was Madun (Rayn Wijaya) who was very stylish even though he was a country bumpkin.

programme.title: Jabariya Jodi

programme.title: Un Alibi
programme.desc: Maude, Pierre and Tom, friends of longstanding, meet up for a birthday party at Max and Lucie's. When they arrive they find Max kneeling beside Lucie's body. His guilt seems obvious. His friends, convinced he's innocent, decide to give him an alibi. But will the group withstand the police investigation?

Full of mischief, he also has a precious talent that delights his best friend Rita and his parents: he can take something ordinary and make it amazing. Thanks to his extraordinary imagination, growing up from day to day becomes child's play.

programme.title: La Cabane A Histoires - EP 25

programme.desc: To gain a better understanding of some professions, school children explain jobs to their parents in their own words.

programme.desc: Charlotte, Olivia, Ines and Isa lead a double life: ordinary girls at court, training in secret to be the best fighters in the kingdom. The 3 Musketeers, that's them! Bound by an unbreakable friendship, they foil plots and protect the king from his enemies.

programme.title: Comme Des Tetes Pas De Poule - EP 28
programme.desc: In the absence of his parents, Vic organises a party and allows Felix and Flavie to invite their friends. Obviously, the party gets out of hand and everything has to be cleaned up before the adults get back.

programme.desc: Contents: Portrait of Flora Vautier, para table tennis player; meeting with Agathe Pauli and Laurent Chardard, members of the French para swimming team, at the World Cup in Saint-Germain-en-Laye.

programme.title: Chef Pays - EP 2
programme.desc: Cooking is a way of building bridges between countries and sharing cultural diversity. Starting with a typical ingredient from the French overseas departments and territories, the chef creates a unique dish.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete on arrow-word grids that they try to fill in by finding the answers to the given clues. But to access the clues, they must first answer questions with a very particular characteristic: the answer is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Interieurs - EP 5
programme.desc: Anne-Catherine Verwaerde visits Marie, ambiance creator who loves materials. She then discovers a guesthouse built on the former site of the Motte-Bossut plant, followed by Atelier d'Alexis, awarded best apprentice in France 2012.

programme.title: Littoral - EP 20
programme.desc: A magazine about the people of the sea. An invitation to set sail for a programme rich in voyages, discoveries and fascinating encounters with those for whom the sea is their life, the ocean-lovers and the high-seas adventurers.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 13
programme.desc: Every day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box on the set. But what does it contain? It's always a surprising object that leads them to discover very different subjects: turtles, bowling or even cloud formation.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus - EP 16
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Yetili - EP 29
programme.desc: Nina and Leon, two little mice, live in a bookshop whose mascot is a large yeti cuddly toy called Yetili. Each evening, once the bookshop has closed, Yetili comes to life and settles his two friends on his knees to read them a story.

programme.title: Dessine Les Animaux Avec Koumi - EP 46
programme.desc: Koumi is 6 years old, mischievous and always full of fun. The dream of her life is to know all the animals of the world, and she absolutely loves drawing! In each episode she explains how to draw animals really well.

programme.title: La Petite Pokou - EP 5
programme.desc: Kakou welcomes his fiancee and Pokou to his kingdom. But his rival tries to sabotage the ceremony; during the wedding, he offers a poisoned present to Kakou, who collapses.

programme.title: La Petite Pokou - EP 6
programme.desc: Pokou and Akuba are taken prisoner. Fortunately, Boni, Kakou's faithful servant, helps them to escape. They seek refuge with the old hermit whose path Pokou had crossed during their journey.

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Veut Prendre Sa Place
programme.desc: The game where everyone wants to be a winner. One quiz, six candidates and, comfortably installed in his chair, one champion... whom everyone dreams of unseating!

programme.title: Bien Vivre En France - EP 1
programme.desc: Each carnival season in French Guiana sees the return of the mysterious touloulous, haunting the masked balls in search of a dance partner. A tradition with unique and very strict rules. But carnival also means music, and the band Les Mecenes has been setting the tempo for forty years.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Au Bout De L'enquete, La Fin Du Crime Parfait ? - EP 32
programme.desc: They are all cases that were closed, considered unsolvable, sometimes resisting police efforts for decades until a forgotten clue, an unhoped-for witness or a forensic innovation finally made it possible to unmask the culprit. Alongside Marie Drucker, the criminologist Alain Bauer explains the technical, psychological, sociological or historical elements involved.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (1 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Ment 3
programme.desc: The Sensitive Affairs Brigade takes on a new enemy. Tackian, president of a water treatment company that has been polluting with impunity for twenty years, is also the one who dismissed Verner from the police. For him, the stakes are twofold: he wants justice as much as revenge.

programme.title: Foot! (1/2) - EP 14
programme.desc: Match summaries, commentary and analyses, after each day of the Ligue 1 McDonald's, the French football championship.

programme.title: Foot! (2/2) - EP 14
programme.desc: Match summaries, commentary and analyses, after each day of the Ligue 1 McDonald's, the French football championship.

programme.title: En Tongs Au Pied De L'himalaya
programme.desc: Andrea, aged 6, has an autism spectrum disorder. He is starting the final year of kindergarten, a crucial year that will determine whether he can stay in school. For Pauline, his mother, the stakes are high. Especially as, recently separated and with no fixed income, she is struggling to find her own stability.

programme.title: Movie - Sakalakala Vallavan
programme.desc: Shakti falls in love with Anjali, but soon realises that she is his bitter rival Chinnasamy's cousin. In a bid to separate them, his family forces him to marry Divya.

programme.title: Movie - Mouna Guru
programme.desc: Karunakaran is an intelligent youth who cannot tolerate injustice. He leaves his home town and joins a college in Chennai, but soon gets involved with a group of corrupt policemen.

programme.title: Movie - Padhavi
programme.desc: Loknath is affectionate to his step-son and step-daughter as he is to his son. But rivalry stews between the step-brothers, and Loknath is unable to resolve the issue.

programme.title: Movie - Nyayam Ketkiren
programme.desc: Lovers Devi and Anand get married, but on their honeymoon, Devi is raped and killed, and Anand sinks into a coma after being severely injured.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Thithikudhe
programme.desc: Childhood friends Venu and Anu are separated when Anu's father is transferred to another town. They promise to meet each year at a temple on a hill, but they only meet after 10 years as grownups.

programme.title: Movie - Dindigul Saarathy
programme.desc: An average-looking man leads an insecure life. When he constantly suspects his beautiful wife of infidelity, she gets tired of his suspicious nature, and decides to leave him.

programme.title: Movie - Mappillai (Old)
programme.desc: Rajeshwari agrees to get her daughter Gayathri married to her beau Saravanan, thinking him to be subservient. But her plans are foiled when she realises that he has a violent past.

programme.title: Movie - Kidari
programme.desc: Kombaiah Pandiayan, a big shot in his village, is stabbed by one of his enemies. Following this, his loyal servant Kidaari sets out to find the culprit.

programme.title: Movie - Pollaathavan (New)
programme.desc: Prabhu is dejected when he learns that his bike has been stolen. He decides to find the people who stole the bike, but lands in trouble when he realises that his bike has been used to transport drugs.

programme.title: Movie - Vaagai Soodavaa
programme.desc: Veluthambi, who aspires for a government job, finds himself teaching poor children in a village. When he learns that they are appointed as bonded labourers, he decides to bring about a change.

programme.title: Movie - Paarthanabagam Illayo
programme.desc: Twin sisters separated at birth are raised differently. Confusion ensues when years later they are mistaken for each other.

programme.title: Movie - Kudumbam

programme.title: Movie - Kutti Puli

programme.desc: The centrepiece of the Premier League Originals strand, PL Stories showcases the personalities who have shaped the Premier League era, and tells their stories with location interviews and high-end filming styles.

programme.title: PL MOMENTS - EP 3
programme.desc: With 481 Premier League appearances and five titles - Michael Carrick is a Premier League icon. Carrick sits down with Premier League Moments to look back over his glittering career - from the West Ham youth academy through to being a key figure in Sir Alex's Ferguson's Manchester United side. In addition to his Premier League career, he also reflects on winning the Champions League, Europa League, the FA Cup as well as his international career.

programme.title: Bournemouth vs Chelsea (MW15) (Live) - EP 142
programme.desc: Bournemouth are winless in their last seven Premier League games against Chelsea (D3 L4), having won three of their previous four against the Blues (L1).

programme.title: PL Stories 2025/26 - EP 27
programme.desc: We sit down for an exclusive interview with the second of two new Premier League Hall of fame inductees, Gary Neville. From his journey from Class of ’92 prodigy to Premier League Hall of Fame icon, he talks us through the moments that defined his legacy at Manchester United. A story on one of the league’s most influential right-backs and a leader whose impact still shapes English football today.

programme.title: Leeds United vs Liverpool (MW15) (Live) - EP 147
programme.desc: Leeds have won just one of their last 12 Premier League games against Liverpool (D3 L8), beating them 2-1 at Anfield in October 2022.

programme.title: The Big Interview 2025/26 - EP 17
programme.desc: Few players have left a legacy in the Premier League quite like Gianfranco Zola. A magician on the pitch, with a personality that made him loved off it too. Revered at Chelsea, his number 25 wasn't worn for another 20 years after he left the club after he helped the Blues to two FA Cup triumphs and UEFA Super Cup and Cup Winners Cup success.

programme.title: 1-to-11 2025/26 - EP 5
programme.desc: Known simply as ‘The Yak,’ Yakubu takes on 1-to-11, selecting his ultimate lineup from the best players he shared the pitch with. A powerhouse striker with 95 Premier League goals across spells at Portsmouth, Middlesbrough, Everton, and Blackburn, he reflects on the teammates who made the biggest impression during his career. Expect a team full of strength, flair, and goalscoring pedigree.

programme.title: Everton vs Nottingham Forest (MW15) - EP 143
programme.desc: Everton have lost just two of their last 11 Premier League games against Nottingham Forest (W7 D2), though both those defeats have come in home matches (0-1 in January 1999, 0-2 last season).

programme.title: Manchester City vs Sunderland (MW15) - EP 144
programme.desc: Sunderland have never won away in 13 attempts against Manchester City in the Premier League (D2 L11). Their last away top-flight win there was in December 1981 at Maine Road.

programme.title: Aston Villa vs Arsenal (MW15) - EP 141
programme.desc: Since their return to the competition in 2019, Aston Villa have won five of their 12 Premier League games against Arsenal (D1 L6), as many as they had in their previous 45 against the Gunners before relegation (D14 L26).

programme.title: The Saturday Wrap 2025/26 - EP 14
programme.desc: A complete review of all the day’s Premier League football, with highlights and studio discussion. The Saturday Wrap broadcasts immediately after Premier League Live on Saturday.

programme.desc: Bournemouth are winless in their last seven Premier League games against Chelsea (D3 L4), having won three of their previous four against the Blues (L1).

programme.title: FS MMA Mick Thompson vs. Mike Weir
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! Nick Thompson and Mike Weir look to take each other out in Vancouver, Canada. One man is victorious after only four minutes of the first round.

programme.title: WCCB Tim Tszyu vs. Sebastian Fundora
programme.desc: From the T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas, undefeated Super Welterweight World Champion Tim Tszyu travels from Australia to defend his title against former World Champion Sebastian Fundora. Fundora stands 6'5", and is known for his all-action and exciting style. He replaces an injured Keith Thurman, and jumps into a World Title match-up against one of boxing's rising stars in Tszyu.

programme.title: Macho: The Hector Camacho Story
programme.desc: This series takes a hard-hitting look at the rise, fall and untimely death of one of boxing's most colorful champions. Hector Camacho's dynamic speed, footwork and power made him a fighter to be reckoned with, but it was his flamboyance and showmanship that ushered in a new era in boxing. The series chronicles his epic battles inside the ring, his struggles with addiction outside of it and the mystery of the double homicide that claimed his life.

programme.title: Tuesday Night Fights Hector Camacho vs. Luis Maysonet
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS revisits some of Hector Camacho's best fights from the legendary USA's Tuesday Night Fights series alongside our new documentary series Macho: The Hector Camacho Story. In this episode Hector "Macho" Camacho (48-3 22 KO 150 lbs) looks to continue his winning streak against Luis Maysonet (28-5 28 KO) in a 10-round contest from Foxwoods Resort Mashantucket CT USA.

programme.title: FS MMA Mick Thompson vs. Mike Weir
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! Nick Thompson and Mike Weir look to take each other out in Vancouver, Canada. One man is victorious after only four minutes of the first round.

programme.title: WCCB Janibek Alimkhanuly vs. Anauel Ngamissengue
programme.desc: Undefeated WBO and IBF Middleweight World Champion Janibek Alimkhanuly will look to defend his titles in his home country of Kazakhstan when he faces fellow undefeated middleweight Anauel Ngamissengue of France. Both fighters bring substantial power into the contest, with Janibek having won nine of his last ten bouts by stoppage, and Ngamissengue stopping six of his last seven.

programme.title: WCCB Tim Tszyu vs. Sebastian Fundora
programme.desc: From the T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas, undefeated Super Welterweight World Champion Tim Tszyu travels from Australia to defend his title against former World Champion Sebastian Fundora. Fundora stands 6'5", and is known for his all-action and exciting style. He replaces an injured Keith Thurman, and jumps into a World Title match-up against one of boxing's rising stars in Tszyu.

programme.title: WCCB Live Isaac Cruz vs. Lamont Roach (Live)
programme.desc: LIVE December 7th from The Frost Bank Center in San Antonio, Texas, a stacked card of four championship bouts is headlined by fan favorite Isaac 'Pitbull' Cruz taking on Lamont Roach with the WBC Interim Super Lightweight World Championship on the line. The Co-Feature is a Main Event-level bout as well, as two World Champions, WBA titleholder Erislandy Lara and WBO/IBF champion Janibek Alimkhanuly, meet to unify their titles in the Middleweight division.

programme.title: WCCB Janibek Alimkhanuly vs. Anauel Ngamissengue
programme.desc: Undefeated WBO and IBF Middleweight World Champion Janibek Alimkhanuly will look to defend his titles in his home country of Kazakhstan when he faces fellow undefeated middleweight Anauel Ngamissengue of France. Both fighters bring substantial power into the contest, with Janibek having won nine of his last ten bouts by stoppage, and Ngamissengue stopping six of his last seven.

programme.title: Fight Quest
programme.desc: Episode 10: California, USA - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Kajukenbo and the Martial Art of Hands, Feet and Throws with Masters Charles Gaylord and Greg Harper.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Paulie Malignaggi vs. Lovemore N'Dou
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Paulie Malignaggi challenging Lovemore N'Dou for the IBF world super lightweight title. Malignaggi looks for a dominating performance to launch him into bouts with boxing superstars such as Ricky Hatton, Juan Diaz and Zab Judah.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 1 featuring Kakuryu, Ikioi, Endo and Yutakayama from the Aki basho, 2018.

programme.title: Macho: The Hector Camacho Story
programme.desc: This series takes a hard-hitting look at the rise, fall and untimely death of one of boxing's most colorful champions. Hector Camacho's dynamic speed, footwork and power made him a fighter to be reckoned with, but it was his flamboyance and showmanship that ushered in a new era in boxing. The series chronicles his epic battles inside the ring, his struggles with addiction outside of it and the mystery of the double homicide that claimed his life.

programme.title: Tuesday Night Fights Hector Camacho vs. Luis Maysonet
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS revisits some of Hector Camacho's best fights from the legendary USA's Tuesday Night Fights series alongside our new documentary series Macho: The Hector Camacho Story. In this episode Hector "Macho" Camacho (48-3 22 KO 150 lbs) looks to continue his winning streak against Luis Maysonet (28-5 28 KO) in a 10-round contest from Foxwoods Resort Mashantucket CT USA.

programme.title: FS MMA Mick Thompson vs. Mike Weir
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! Nick Thompson and Mike Weir look to take each other out in Vancouver, Canada. One man is victorious after only four minutes of the first round.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Yuriorkis Gamboa vs. Marcos Ramirez
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features undefeated featherweights Yuriorkis Gamboa, 'El Cinclon de Guantanamo', (11-0, 9 KOs) and Marcos Ramirez (25-0, 16 KOs) from the Pechanga Resort and Casino in Temecula, California, USA, on October 4, 2008. The two young fighters had a quick ending street brawl that brought the crowd to its feet.

programme.title: WCCB Marco Huck vs. Ola Afolabi I
programme.desc: We look back to the beginning of the historic years-long rivalry between Marco Huck and Ola Afolabi, which began in Ludwigsburg, Germany with Huck putting his WBO Cruiserweight World Championship on the line for the first time. The result would be a closely fought, all-action contest that would lead to three more meetings between the two cruiserweights for years to come. Don't miss the kick off to the Huck vs. Afolabi rivalry for the WBO Cruiserweight World Title on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: WCCB Marco Huck vs. Ola Afolabi II
programme.desc: In this edition of World Class Championship Boxing, the WBO Cruiserweight World Championship is on the line when Germany's Marco Huck and Britain's Ola Afolabi meet for the second time in their memorable rivalry. Huck is coming off a majority decision defeat to Alexander Povetkin three months earlier, when he stepped up in weight to compete for the Heavyweight Title.

programme.title: World Karate Federation
programme.desc: The highest level of competition in the sport of karate anywhere in the world will take place from Budapest, Hungary, as the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS take place. The top competitors from across the globe, from six different continents, will all converge on Budapest to stake their claim as the best in the world. Don't miss the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS, only on FIGHT SPORTS.

In this episode we see the best Judo from the Zagreb Grand Prix, where some of the young Judo fans get the opportunity to train with former Olympic champion Mark Huizinga and triple world champion Illias Iliadis. programme.title: Late Night with Seth Meyers
programme.desc: Emmy Award-nominated "Late Night with Seth Meyers," hosted by award-winning writer and performer Seth Meyers, is home to incisive humor, topical jokes and A-list celebrity guests. The series’ signature "A Closer Look" segment has garnered millions of views and is widely lauded for its tightly written and thoughtful approach to analyzing and satirizing news of the day.

programme.title: Late Night with Seth Meyers

programme.title: Executive Decisions - EP 6
programme.desc: ‘Executive Decisions’ is a CNBC podcast offering a rare window into the minds of top decision-makers. Hosted by Steve Sedgwick, each episode explores the pivotal choices that shape the careers and legacies of business leaders and policymakers. Through candid conversations about risk, doubt and conviction, the series reminds us that even the most powerful face uncertainty and trade-offs.

programme.title: CNBC Sport: On The Record - EP 205
programme.desc: CNBC Sport: On The Record explores the convergence of sports, business, and investing. Each week, we sit down with the biggest names in sports - from league commissioners, team owners, influential media executives and top athletes - to give you an insider's perspective on the strategies, deals, and stories shaping sports and business.

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon - EP 2222

programme.title: CNBC Explains - EP 4
programme.desc: ‘CNBC Explains’ is a dynamic explainer series that dives deep into the forces shaping our world. Each episode unpacks complex business and economic topics, breaking them down into clear, compelling narratives. With expert insights, data-driven visuals and a global perspective, this series helps viewers understand not just what is happening, but why it matters.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and "accepted wisdom" to find the real story. You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world.

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN’s Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. programme.title: Destined - EP 32
programme.desc: Lin Yu Ru (Song Yi), the daughter of a cloth merchant who’s suffered childhood hardships, is married off to Gu Jiu Si (Bai Jing Ting), the notorious son of Yangzhou's wealthiest family, infamous for his indolent ways. They grow closer despite their differences.

programme.title: Ye Cheng - EP 4

programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Prism Breaker - EP 24
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] The judge declines Lau Yu-fan’s application for an extension of the trial. programme.title: The Heir to the Throne (with Eng Subs) - EP 29
programme.desc: Chi-bun is very worried as Ho-yee declares she is going to find the murder weapon that was used for killing Sau-yi, so he returns to the Yau household to look for the murder weapon. However, police catch him. Chi-bun wants to bring Ka-pik and Hiu-ling along as he flees. But Rio and Ko Tsun intercept him with their car.

programme.title: Golden City (Ep 751-800) VVD Mandarin - EP 769
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: The Limbo - EP 8
programme.desc: As the New Year approaches, an unexpected subsidence accident occurs at the old department store, Luobai Mall, in Haizhou City, trapping 13 people underground. This race against time and for survival becomes a profound test of humanity, morality, and faith...

programme.title: No Room for Crime - EP 2
programme.desc: Cho-yiu complains about Chi-hin abusing violence. PTU officers are worried about Chi-hin. Chi-hin is certain Cho-yiu killed Brother Shu. Chi-hin’s ex-girlfriend Wing-kei questions Cho-yiu, but she does not have any evidence. Chi-hin feels helpless as she has to release him. Cho-yiu watches gang boss West Kowloon King, aka Ruthless, who is also a drug lord. He recalls the situation when he and his girlfriend Ting were arrested in Thailand five years ago.

programme.title: Prism Breaker - EP 25
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] The Tai Cho-fuk corruption case goes to trial with Lui Hok-sum as a tainted witness. Tai Cho-fuk scolds him for being ungrateful. programme.title: The Heir to the Throne (with Eng Subs) - EP 30
programme.desc: At Sau-yi’s farewell ceremony, Ka-pik comes to see Sau-yi for the last time. Ko Tsun also reaches closure on his regrets about Ko Sing’s death. He decides to go to South East Asia and work as a volunteer in the field of education. Fast-forward one year, and Chi-tung runs into Ko Tsun in Singapore.

programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Class of Distinction - EP 12
programme.desc: Hong Kong superstar Leon Lai joins forces with many friends in the entertainment industry to star in the TVB drama "Good Morning Sir," playing a passionate and energetic young teacher who experiences unique challenges in school, family, and relationships.

programme.title: Knot To Treasure - EP 5
programme.desc: Wei (Zhu Jiang), the eldest son of Wei (Chen Jiewen), is wild and untamed. Under family pressure, he finally marries Shan (Zhang Fengni), with whom he has been dating for many years. After their marriage, Yat-sen develops an extramarital affair with Yan (Cui Jiabao), eventually living with her and abandoning Shan. Later, realizing Yan's overly open attitude towards relationships, he decides to pursue Shan again.

programme.title: Shadow Of Justice - EP 19
programme.desc: Because of some transfer arrangement and several complicated cases, AICIP Au Yeung Chung (Bobby Au Yeung) and CUSP Tsui Hay-yi (Joey Meng) become collaborating partners. The duo have mutual understanding. Sheung Siu (Jeannie Chan), daughter of a logistics company boss, hates Au Yeung Chung as she is certain that he has caused her family to break up. Au Yeung Chung had promised the late Mrs. Sheung he would be tolerant of Sheung Siu.

programme.title: Shadow Of Justice - EP 20

programme.title: Defected, The - EP 9
programme.desc: Inspector Sheung-bang of the Crime Squad was once a rising star in the police force. While trying to save a colleague, he was shot by a gangster, his life forever changed. After his miraculous survival, Sheung-bang pursues his case with even greater resolve, earning him the nickname "Iron Detective," though he constantly suffers from the aftereffects.

Au Yeung Chung had promised the late Mrs. Sheung he would be tolerant of Sheung Siu.

programme.title: Defected, The - EP 11
programme.desc: Inspector Sheung-bang of the Crime Squad was once a rising star in the police force. While trying to save a colleague, he was shot by a gangster, his life forever changed. After his miraculous survival, Sheung-bang pursues his case with even greater resolve, earning him the nickname "Iron Detective," though he constantly suffers from the aftereffects.

programme.title: Defected, The - EP 12
programme.desc: Inspector Sheung-bang of the Crime Squad was once a rising star in the police force. While trying to save a colleague, he was shot by a gangster, his life forever changed. After his miraculous survival, Sheung-bang pursues his case with even greater resolve, earning him the nickname "Iron Detective," though he constantly suffers from the aftereffects.

programme.title: Class of Distinction - EP 13
programme.desc: Hong Kong superstar Leon Lai joins forces with many friends in the entertainment industry to star in the TVB drama "Good Morning Sir," playing a passionate and energetic young teacher who experiences unique challenges in school, family, and relationships.

programme.title: Knot To Treasure - EP 6
programme.desc: Wei (Zhu Jiang), the eldest son of Wei (Chen Jiewen), is wild and untamed. Under family pressure, he finally marries Shan (Zhang Fengni), with whom he has been dating for many years. After their marriage, Yat-sen develops an extramarital affair with Yan (Cui Jiabao), eventually living with her and abandoning Shan. Later, realizing Yan's overly open attitude towards relationships, he decides to pursue Shan again.

programme.title: Shadow Of Justice - EP 21
programme.desc: Because of some transfer arrangement and several complicated cases, AICIP Au Yeung Chung (Bobby Au Yeung) and CUSP Tsui Hay-yi (Joey Meng) become collaborating partners. The duo have mutual understanding. Sheung Siu (Jeannie Chan), daughter of a logistics company boss, hates Au Yeung Chung as she is certain that he has caused her family to break up. Au Yeung Chung had promised the late Mrs. Sheung he would be tolerant of Sheung Siu.

programme.title: Shadow Of Justice - EP 22
programme.desc: Because of some transfer arrangement and several complicated cases, AICIP Au Yeung Chung (Bobby Au Yeung) and CUSP Tsui Hay-yi (Joey Meng) become collaborating partners. The duo have mutual understanding. Sheung Siu (Jeannie Chan), daughter of a logistics company boss, hates Au Yeung Chung as she is certain that he has caused her family to break up. Au Yeung Chung had promised the late Mrs. Sheung he would be tolerant of Sheung Siu.

programme.title: Defected, The - EP 11
programme.desc: Inspector Sheung-bang of the Crime Squad was once a rising star in the police force. While trying to save a colleague, he was shot by a gangster, his life forever changed. After his miraculous survival, Sheung-bang pursues his case with even greater resolve, earning him the nickname "Iron Detective," though he constantly suffers from the aftereffects.

programme.title: Defected, The - EP 12
programme.desc: Inspector Sheung-bang of the Crime Squad was once a rising star in the police force. While trying to save a colleague, he was shot by a gangster, his life forever changed. After his miraculous survival, Sheung-bang pursues his case with even greater resolve, earning him the nickname "Iron Detective," though he constantly suffers from the aftereffects.

programme.title: Gods Of Honour - EP 16
programme.desc: NAR JAR (CHAN HO MAN, BENNY) was a ‘Fire master’ in his previous life. He was killed by LEE CHING (YUEN WAH). After reincarnation, he ironically becomes CHING’s third son. He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager.

programme.title: Madam Cutie On Duty - EP 5
programme.desc: FA PING (Priscilla Wong), who was often made fun of by the others for being ugly during her childhood, underwent cosmetic surgery in the wake of an accident. Ever since then, she has been firmly convinced that an attractive appearance has a significant impact on one's life, and remains the same after joining the police.

programme.title: I've Got The Power - EP 1
programme.desc: Chung Hau-nin (Ruco Chan), Kiu Yeuk-lam (Natalie Tong) and Ko Yung (Joel Chan) are complete strangers. After surviving a traffic accident, they astonishingly gain mystical power!_x000D__x000D_Hau-nin and Ding Shuk-man (Moon Lau) are a loving young married couple. Hau-nin intends to use his mystical power for his own benefit, but he knows how to use his mystical power to help other people as he is influenced by Yeuk-lam, who has a righteous character.

programme.title: Battle Against Evil, The - EP 2
programme.desc: General LI (TONG, MICHAEL) of the Chor Kingdom and wizard CHAI (CHAN HO, MOSES) were colleagues under the same mentor. LI killed CHAR when he found out that CHAR was having an affair with his wife SUKI (LEUNG TSAND, JADE). SUKI was ashamed of her affair, so she committed suicide. After she died, CHAI was furious and killed LI. He used bad magic to turn LI’s spirit into a cloud of hatred in order to prevent him from reincarnation.

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era - EP 10
programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60’s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development.

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era - EP 11
programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60’s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development.

programme.title: The Flying Mr. B
programme.desc: Mr. Shi, a secondary PE teacher, accidentally takes a "super pill" invented by the science teacher and gains superpower, turning into Mr. B. He uses his superpower to help the school sports team win the championship and prevent crimes. When the triad is made aware of Mr. B's superpower, they try to gain the super pill for nefarious purposes.

programme.title: Everlasting Love
programme.desc: Young intern doctor Eric meets Pei Jun and quickly falls in love with her, unaware that she works as a hostess in a night club. Despite their social differences, can their love story defy the odds and lead to a happily ever after?

programme.title: Rob-B-Hood
programme.desc: The famous "Gang Trio" is hired to kidnap a baby for 30 million dollars. When they realize that the triad is after both the ransom and the baby's life, they decide to make the hostage their protege. Cornered by cops and threatened by gangsters, the three 'Rob-B-Hood' must put the baby safely back in his cradle.

programme.title: Destiny's Champion
programme.desc: An aging fighter relives the mistakes of his violent past through a poor and streetwise kid, who severely injures his nemesis during a battle to win a girl's heart.

programme.title: Let's Make Laugh
programme.desc: When a young housewife's debt-ridden, philandering husband leaves her with a mountain of tax debts, a security guard is hired by the tax authority to guard the assets, but he starts falling for her instead.

programme.title: Hong Kong Playboys
programme.desc: Sheng is a rich playboy who lives a carefree and fun life with the ladies, until his mother decides that he should get married. Up against other lady killers in his quest to find Miss Right, Sheng must decide what he wants.

programme.title: Long Arm of the Law Part 3
programme.desc: Chinese ex-soldier Li is wrongly accused and seeks refuge in Hong Kong to escape a death sentence. En route, he meets Sam and Moon. While Li has fallen in love with Moon, Hong Kong triad kidnaps Moon and coerces Li into aiding a robbery. Meanwhile, the mainland police officer tracks Li's path to Hong Kong, intensifying the chase.

programme.title: I Love Lolanto
programme.desc: Lolanto, a playboy, is injured and meets the daughter of a tycoon, Man, in the hospital. Man is mentally retarded and makes friends easily with Lolanto hence Man's father hires him to take care of her. However, as Man goes through treatments and recovers, her feelings for Lolanto also changes...

programme.title: Teenage Dreamers
programme.desc: Ting Ting is a student in an all-girl high school. She tries out for the school's stage production of Romeo and Juliet with an all-boy school and promptly falls for the lead, Jackson. While Ting Ting is swept away by the excitement of her first love, Jackson turns out to be more of a player than a partner.

programme.title: Lifeline
programme.desc: A heroic tale about Hong Kong's brave firefighters. These courageous men can march into disastrous firegrounds and risk their lives to save others. However, do they have the same courage to confront their personal issues?

programme.title: Law Or Justice
programme.desc: Lawyer Yip defends a rapist and gets him acquitted. Yip's boyfriend Fong, a police inspector, knows he is guilty and despises Yip for not upholding justice. The victim's sister takes revenge by spiking the rapist's drink but is raped instead. This puts the rapist back in court. Will Yip choose to uphold law or justice this time?

programme.title: How to Pick Girls Up !
programme.desc: Xin, a helpless loser in love, calls in to a radio show hosted by DJ Tsang to ask desperately for help. A self-proclaimed love expert, Tsang takes it upon himself to make sure Xin meets girls and leads him on a series of absurd excursions into the wild and dangerous world of modern love.

programme.title: Prince Charming
programme.desc: Chen Li Pin, the nerdy son of a business tycoon, and his friend seek love in Hawaii. Returning home in disappointment, they accidentally find themselves in a messy identity swap. It is at this time that Chen falls for a beautiful girl May, who thinks he is a company chauffeur...

programme.title: Mr Vampire
programme.desc: Taoist priest Kou is assigned to re-bury a rich man, in the hope that the new tomb will bring further prosperity. When the corpse turns into a vampire and wreaks havoc in the village, his disciples are also hurt by the vampire and possessed by a female ghost respectively. How can Kou save his disciples and hunt down the vampire at the same time?

programme.title: Mr. Possessed
programme.desc: Riley is cursed by an evil spirit to not be able to approach any woman. When he falls in love with Siu Yu, Riley's mother decides to use her to help him vanquish the evil spirit. On their wedding night, Riley passes out after protecting Siu Yu from the attack of the evil spirit. Can the two finally break the curse?

programme.title: Girl with the Diamond Slipper
programme.desc: An aspiring TV actress gets into hot water when a stolen diamond is hidden in the shoes she bought for a party.

programme.title: Maybe It's Love
programme.desc: A girl Marble witnesses a murder case and reports it to the police. After much investigation, the police can only sort out the complicated relationships between a rich merchant's mistress, a postman, a shop owner and his wife, but find no clue as to who the murderer is. Therefore, Marble decides to carry out her own investigation...

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Ma Wing Jing and his brother arrive in Shanghai to make their fortune. Befriending a powerful mobster Tam, Ma is given his nightclub when he saves Tam's life. Ma's fortune rises but he must overcome the corruption and violence to survive.

programme.title: Cop Shop Babes
programme.desc: Island East Police Station headed by Madam Lui is known for its "Cop Shop Babes" as all the officers there are female. Two police officers, Beer and Satay, apply for an internal transfer to this station in order to approach the girls. It is at this time that the police receives a bomb threat - can they resolve the case?

programme.title: July Rhapsody
programme.desc: A 40-year-old high school teacher is in midlife crisis. His marriage is on the rocks and he is involved in a taboo romance with a female student who has a crush on him. Meanwhile, his wife is off to care for her dying ex-lover who shares a complicated history with the couple...

programme.title: The Exodus
programme.desc: A low-ranking cop discovers a group of women, including his superior, Madam Fang and his wife, plotting to eliminate the world of men.

programme.title: The Gambling Ghost
programme.desc: Sammo Hung plays three roles: Fatty, Fatty's father and grandfather. Hoping to become rich, hotel staff Fatty dives into gambling with his friend to the dismay of his father. When Fatty hits rock bottom, his grandfather's ghost appears to help him. As Fatty finds out that his grandfather was murdered, he vows to avenge his death.

programme.title: City of Desire
programme.desc: Sister 13 returns to Macau after 17 years to succeed her father's underground empire, the prostitution business. She tries to stop their exploitation of the sex workers, but Macau's economy flourished after the handover, propelling the prostitution and gambling businesses. The city is blinded by desire and Sister 13 can do nothing to help...

programme.title: All's Well End's Well (Extended Version)
programme.desc: In this beloved Hong Kong comedy, the three Chang brothers living with their parents learn that love blossoms with nurture, but withers when taken for granted through haste, deceit, and selfishness. This extended version features an additional shootout scene that was omitted from the original theatrical release during Lunar New Year 2016.

programme.title: Mr. Virgin
programme.desc: Mr. Virgin is a romantic comedy about a twenty-nine year-old man Chao Yu-ting (Alfred Chang) who has seemingly been cursed. He becomes paranoid when a Feng Shui expert tells him it will be unlucky for him to marry before the age of thirty... so comical chaos line the days up to his next birthday!

programme.title: Women
programme.desc: Bo Yi's husband is having an affair, so Bo Yi divorces him and joins the "Happy Spinsters Club" set up by her friends. However, she soon finds out that she does not enjoy being single and while sorting out her thoughts, her repentant husband begs her forgiveness. She must now decide on what she truly wants.

programme.title: Kung Fu Mahjong 3
programme.desc: Gambling tycoon Man suddenly marries his new partner Sophie, which shocked his only son, Ken. In the wake of Man's heart attack, Ken must battle Sophie - who has persuaded Man to transfer his grand master title to her in the event of his death - for the rightful claim to the family's gambling business in a riveting game of mahjong.

programme.title: Wise Guys Never Die
programme.desc: Nick meets Teddy, a con artiste, when he is sent to prison for embezzlement, and Teddy teaches him all the gambling tricks. After their release, they team up with Teddy's lover Lora, to take revenge on Dragon, who framed Teddy for his sentence. Nick though is seduced by Lora and they end up in an affair. Will Nick finally join Teddy in his revenge?

programme.title: Cherie
programme.desc: Cherie Chung plays the title character in this sexy romance as a fitness instructor who attracts the attentions of a wealthy businessman and a handsome photographer.

programme.title: Love on Delivery
programme.desc: A delivery boy Yin wants to impress his dream girl Li, so he enrols in a martial arts course to learn strange moves. Being timid, Yin saves Li while wearing a Garfield mask but the credit is stolen by Karate Master, Liu. To prove himself and win Li back, Yin defeats Liu in the ring with his unique martial arts move "Invincible Wind and Fire Spin".

programme.title: King Gambler
programme.desc: This film was actually a lively forerunner to the gambling film craze, which eventually swept Asian cinema. Here, it's cardsharp versus cardsharp with a lot more kung-fu action, in a battle of wits and fists to become the king of the casino. The double stings and triple crosses raise in complexity and imagination until what started as an unusual box office risk became a top ten hit of 1976.

programme.title: The Scandalous Warlord
programme.desc: General Feng occupies the city of Shandong, and soldiers and civilians alike welcome him without knowing his tyrannical and lustful nature. His first official business is to inspect the brothels and take the prostitutes home to become his concubines. Feng is finally killed by his officers, but will the new general rule the city differently?

programme.title: The Invincible Fist
programme.desc: A dedicated chief constable nicknamed "The Invincible Fist" is chasing after a band of bandits near a village one day and encounters an innocent blind girl. He quickly falls in love with her, but finds out she is the daughter of a vicious bandit. Will he kill the father of his lover?

programme.title: Mist Over Dream Lake
programme.desc: A young girl Chen is sent away by her parents who are going through divorce, to stay with the Chang's. On the Chang's farm, she meets their two sons, the youngest daughter and a young artist, and spends a summer with them that she will never forget.

programme.title: The Magnificent Trio
programme.desc: A group of farmers who are being oppressed by the local magistrates kidnap one of the magistrate's daughter in the hope of being heard by the authorities. A wandering swordsman offers his help and aiding him are two fighters who have both switched sides from being the oppressors to the oppressed. The trio fight back against the magistrates!

programme.title: Princess Iron Fan
programme.desc: As Monkey and his gang make their way to the West through Fire Mountain, they ran into the evil Princess Iron Fan, Madam White Bone and her sexy sister, and have to fight their way through.

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: Notorious assassin Nieh Cheng has retired into hiding. However, when Premier Yen's family is massacred, he seeks out the reclusive swordsman and coaxes him into a final revenge mission in this epic story set in the Six Kingdom era.

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: In this classic romantic melodrama, nightclub songstress Qing Qing falls for the handsome Peng Nan. However, the two go through an emotional roller coaster of misunderstandings, separations and mutual torment. When the two finally fall back into love, Qing Qing receives a shocking revelation that brings the story to its inevitable sad ending.

programme.title: The Sword of Swords
programme.desc: The Sword Master passes on his sword to his disciple Lin before he dies. However, Lin soon discovers that another disciple Fang also eyes the sword and plots to take it away from Lin, destroying his family and blinding him in the process. Finally, Lin battles Fang for revenge and vows to reclaim his sword.

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperor's death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: Clan Of The White Lotus
programme.desc: The head of White Lotus Clan, Lo, is a highly skilled martial artist who supports the Qing government and helps destroy the rebellion group. Hung from Shaolin who kills Lo's brother, is being hunted and hides in another rebel Hu's house. The clan attacks at night killing Hu and his sister, but Hung manages to get Hu's pregnant wife to safety.

programme.title: Blue Skies
programme.desc: A young singer Hsiao Yun becomes an overnight sensation after standing in for another singer at the eleventh hour. Her success comes at a heavy price however, when her love with a pianist suffers. On top of this, Hsiao Yun must also deal with the unwanted affections from an influential backer of her show.

programme.title: The Avenging Eagle
programme.desc: Qi Ming Xing, an assassin of the Iron Boat Clan, decides to quit the clan. When hunted by the clan, he is saved by Swordsman Zhuo Yi Fan. Zhuo accidentally discovers that Qi is the killer of his wife, but forgives him after knowing Qi's guilt over her death. The two finally team up to destroy the evil clan.

programme.title: Forbidden Tales of Two Cities
programme.desc: Li Han-hsiang wrote and directed this charming and fascinating comedy, Forbidden Tales Of Two Cities. The two cities in the picture are Macau, where a love quartet is a morally-unsound source for sexual entertainment; and Hong Kong, where a woman enters a gambler's apartment to find four shackles hanging from his ceiling to aid in kinky activities.

programme.title: Heaven and Hell
programme.desc: When an angel, Ling, decides to help his two friends who have fallen in love to escape from Heaven, he is sent to live as a human on earth as his punishment. Reincarnated as a cab driver, he sacrifices his own life to save another ill-fated couple and lands in hell, where he has to face off against the ghosts and demons to fight his way out!

programme.title: Return of the Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This sequel makes for more bittersweet laughs and heart-wrenching misfortune, as Ah Niu gets out of the jail to find his true love becoming the wife of an abusive husband, and his uncle further exploits his naive nature.

programme.title: The 82 Tenants
programme.desc: Continuing the success of the classic comedy "House of 72 tenants", this sequel tells the stories of tenants living in an old building in Hong Kong who are forced to evict by the developers. Some tenants prefer to take the compensation while some resist the move. Will the acquisitions plan destroy the harmony of the neighborhood?

programme.title: The Amorous Lotus Pan
programme.desc: Adapted from the renowned Chinese novel, The Water Margin, this is the story of a poor and beautiful girl Lotus Pan, who is raped by her master and had to be married off to a midget who treats her badly. Lost and lonely, Pan unwittingly becomes a pawn in the game of lust between her husband's playboy brother Wu Song, and a murderous man Men Ching.

programme.title: Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: Wei Chun is a cocky young man sentenced to jail for killing a man in a fight. One day, Wei Chun picks a fight with a seemingly defenseless old man who completely thrashes him! The old man turns out to be the master of monkey style kung fu and as they become friends, he gives Wei Chun half of a medallion that would direct him to hidden secrets.

programme.title: Two Con Men
programme.desc: Two Con Men is a wonderfully twisted, pseudo-romantic comedy in the vein of "Robin Hood" meets "The Sting". Starring Liang Tien as Clever Chan and Chang Ying (who's done over 400 films) as Tricky Ching, it's the age-old competition between a rookie con artist versus the ultimate, experienced flimflam man. It's a game Chen cannot afford to lose, because people's lives - including his own, hang in the balance of good versus evil.

programme.title: The Brave Archer 3
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong go to Iron Palm Peak to search for the Book of Wumu. The chief of Iron Palm discovers their visit, and seriously injures Huang. It seems only the Southern Emperor Duan can heal her, but will Huang be healed in time?

programme.title: Madam White Snake
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai is perfect as Pak Su-cheng, the stunning snake goddess who assumes a womanly form so that she can taste the pleasures of a human life! Pak seduces young scholar, Hsu Hsien when she recognises him as her saviour in another life 1,000 years ago. But when Buddhist monk Fa Hai finds out about the union, the pair is forced to split...

programme.title: The Blood Brothers
programme.desc: The friendship of three sworn brothers, Zhang, Huang and Ma ends when Ma gives in to corruption and falls for Huang's wife, eventually leading to a bloody ending.

programme.title: The Empress Dowager
programme.desc: Award-winning drama featuring a passionate performance by Lisa Lu, enhanced by sumptuous costumes and sets, produces a powerful, fascinating story. In five thousand years of Chinese history, there was never a more fascinating woman than the dragon lady of the Ching Dynasty, also the Empress Dowager, who was the power behind the throne for the last half of the 19th century. The vast tapestry of palace intrigues is vividly brought to the screen.

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: Hsieh Choun, the Black Dragon, is in trouble with the police since Wang Sien Tien's gang is helping them; he is no longer free to conduct his drugs shipments out of the port freely as he used to. He buys more thugs and killers to dispose of the young upstart, and soon Wang is in dire straits, in the port of Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Mirror and the Lichee
programme.desc: The curious title in this Huangmei Opera romance refers to the two props that signal a happy beginning between a scholar and a local beauty. The scholar polishes mirrors so as to be closer to his love, who signals her approval by tossing him some lichees. From that point on the course of their love becomes rocky, complete with murder and suicide.

programme.title: Flying Guillotine 2
programme.desc: In a time of anti-Manchu sentiment, Emperor Yong Zheng employs his ruthless Blood Hound Corps to silence any dissenters. Only one man and his signature weapon, The Flying Guillotine, stand in their way.

programme.title: Les Belles
programme.desc: Acknowledged as one of the greatest Hong Kong musicals, this lavish movie starring Linda Lin, who won Best Actress for her performance, infuses its wispy plot with style and wit, and the results are pure pleasure.

programme.title: Genius Go Go Go
programme.desc: Hosted by Sam Tseng and Hsu Nai Lin, this top Taiwan variety show, splits celebrity guests into two teams to battle in various game segments.

programme.title: Genius Go Go Go
programme.desc: Hosted by Sam Tseng and Hsu Nai Lin, this top Taiwan variety show, splits celebrity guests into two teams to battle in various game segments.

programme.title: All About Health
programme.desc: How well do you know your body? What should you eat to be healthy and energetic? Are health tips available online reliable? Tune in to this programme as the hosts give you all the answers!

programme.title: TVBS Insight People
programme.desc: This programme presents interviews with famous personalities.

programme.title: Chop Chop Show
programme.desc: The show invites younger generations to talk about relationship, career, entertainment, current affairs, and all the other popular topics that they care and complain about.

programme.title: Super Taste: Amazing Bites
programme.desc: Super Taste focuses on funny travel style to discover destinations and local-dishes. Standing on audience's view point, program's hosts introduce every sightseeing sites with close-witness, young and humorous way to announce the spirits of Super Taste.

programme.title: Discover New Taiwan Step By Step
programme.desc: The creative production team goes around Taiwan in search of inspiring stories in the country. Get to know more unique individuals and discover the true spirit of Taiwan.

programme.title: Global Golden Line
programme.desc: It is the first professional reality car show, providing concrete evaluations of cars on the market, the deepest appreciation for classic cars, the hottest trends in the motoring world, and analysis of the latest auto tech trends.

programme.title: Super Taste: 48 Hour Burning Desire!
programme.desc: Super Taste focuses on funny travel style to discover destinations and local-dishes. Standing on audience's view point, program's hosts introduce every sightseeing sites with close-witness, young and humorous way to announce the spirits of Super Taste.

programme.title: Chop Chop Show

programme.title: Queen
programme.desc: From makeup, skincare, hairstyle, clothing, horoscopes, parenting, to travel, all kinds of fashion-related topics are presented in the program. Pauline Lan leads dozens of professionals and experts across categories to offer the best fashion insights and tips.

programme.title: TVBS News
programme.desc: A news programme that provides the latest Taiwan and international news, as well as in-depth analyses of important issues around the world.

programme.title: TVBS News
programme.desc: A news programme that provides the latest Taiwan and international news, as well as in-depth analyses of important issues around the world.

programme.title: Genius Go Go Go
programme.desc: Hosted by Sam Tseng and Hsu Nai Lin, this top Taiwan variety show, splits celebrity guests into two teams to battle in various game segments.

programme.title: Super Taste: Go Go! Two- Day Trip
programme.desc: Super Taste focuses on funny travel style to discover destinations and local-dishes. Standing on audience's view point, program's hosts introduce every sightseeing sites with close-witness, young and humorous way to announce the spirits of Super Taste.

programme.title: Hu's Travel Agency
programme.desc: Hu's Travel Agency features TV host Hu Gua with his children Hsiao-Chen and Hu Shih-An, running Taiwan's "most human-centered travel agency." Centered in Miaoli, they blend family bonds and local culture to create heartfelt journeys.

programme.title: Hu's Travel Agency
programme.desc: Hu's Travel Agency features TV host Hu Gua with his children Hsiao-Chen and Hu Shih-An, running Taiwan's "most human-centered travel agency." Centered in Miaoli, they blend family bonds and local culture to create heartfelt journeys.

programme.title: TVBS Sisy's World News
programme.desc: Stay with Host Sisy Chen and the experts for the latest in global news, financial updates and current political events.

programme.title: TVBS Sisy's Finance Weekly
programme.desc: Stay with Host Sisy Chen and the experts for the latest in global news, financial updates and current political events.

programme.title: Super Taste: Go Bananas! Corp.

programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] The Tai Cho-fuk corruption case goes to trial with Lui Hok-sum as a tainted witness. Tai Cho-fuk scolds him for being ungrateful. Suddenly, gunmen barge into the courtroom. Tai Cho-fuk instantly controls the scene and arrogantly makes fun of everyone. The trio abruptly retaliate against the gunmen.

programme.title: The Wanted Detective - EP 32
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] On his wedding day, Xiao Bei Ming (Wang Xing Yue), the best detective of Qi, was framed as a demon and fled into the lake on the charge of murdering his master and treason. Three years later, he returned and joins a group of witty partners to seek justice.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2098
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: The Heir to the Throne (with Eng Subs) - EP 30
programme.desc: At Sau-yi’s farewell ceremony, Ka-pik comes to see Sau-yi for the last time. Ko Tsun also reaches closure on his regrets about Ko Sing’s death. He decides to go to South East Asia and work as a volunteer in the field of education. Fast-forward one year, and Chi-tung runs into Ko Tsun in Singapore.

programme.title: Golden City (Ep 751-800) VVD Mandarin - EP 770
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Good Job - EP 1
programme.desc: Eun Seon-Woo (Jung Il-Woo) owns the biggest company in Korea and secretly runs a private detective office. Don Se-Ra (Kwon Yuri) was born with hyperacuity and uses it to help people. As the arrogant and the helpful meet to solve cases together, romance blossoms.

programme.title: Destined - EP 32
programme.desc: Lin Yu Ru (Song Yi), the daughter of a cloth merchant who’s suffered childhood hardships, is married off to Gu Jiu Si (Bai Jing Ting), the notorious son of Yangzhou's wealthiest family, infamous for his indolent ways. They grow closer despite their differences.
